::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer looks from the machine to Diamond. "This piece of slag? 
Jus' scans it and stuff. Gives me the programmin', and what the 
necklace does and how it works. WIth any luck, it works by 
transmittin' data back to the bot, in which case we can trace it back 
to the bot and get 'im. My chips worked without any sort of data 
transferr back to me, but ones that are effective are really hard and 
expensive to produce, an' easy t' cancel out. Gets easier t' do stuff 
yourself."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> "Yeah,well, the old cuffs and things worked well.  But a bot could 
> get out of them.  IF one knew how, one could break the connection 
> permenantly. Thus become free from them."  
> She looked at the ground as she remembered when she found the way 
to 
> break her link and become free.  That was a few months before the 
> council even realized she was no longer in thier control.
> "Yeah,  the cuffs and other devices were good, but not fool proof."
> She smiled slightly, thinking, this fool beat out a fool proof 
system.
> "You said you use chips now? Things must have advanced since I left 
> home."
> 
> She stood up and walked over to the machine,"So what will this 
thing 
> tell us about that necklace?"
